   "body_snippet": "<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->\r\nExternal tools are convenient way to, for instance, call registry editor or ping some port of the remote machine. +  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): Enable users to trigger external tools via configurable keyboard shortcuts for faster access.\nApproach: Add Hotkey property to ExternalTool class, update ExternalToolsWindow to allow configuration, and implement global key handling in FrmMain to trigger the associated tool."
 }
